pkgmetadata.longdescription: Index Number Calculation // Computes bilateral and multilateral index numbers. It has support for several standard bilateral indices as well as the GEKS multilateral index number methods (see Ivancic, Diewert and Fox (2011) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2010.09.003) . It also supports updating of GEKS indexes using several splicing methods.
